Enjoyed a busy Monday in the district. Had visits in Maryville, Edwardsville, Glen Carbon, and Bunker Hill. Below are some of those stops in this #districtrecap.

Enjoyed celebrating the 10th anniversary of @SIHF_Health’s Bunker Hill Family Health Center. This facility is a federally qualified health center providing access to care in an underserved area. I’ve supported robust funding for FQHCs because of their important mission. pic.twitter.com/SUqc82GAPj
Thank you for coming in to meet with me. Passing #USMCA will significantly increase access to markets for our farmers. https://twitter.com/dairyidfa/status/1141075708887928832 …

Enjoyed talking with Ian in my Maryville office this morning. Contacting an elected official is a requirement for the @boyscouts Citizenship in the Community merit badge he is pursuing. pic.twitter.com/pQTVFqNNYY

Had a great time visiting with students, faculty, and staff at the @SIUE School of Nursing this morning. Appreciated the opportunity to man the control room for a lab simulation presentation. Thanks to Dr. Bernaix and Chancellor Pembrook for hosting. pic.twitter.com/RfyaHHpT1Z
Happy Father’s Day to all the great dads, especially my dad Marty! Thanks for all you do. pic.twitter.com/IVkH5JqjdD

Appreciated @CNNPolitics covering the stories of two staffers, Matt Mika and Zack Barth, who were on the field with us two years ago today. Read more about their recovery and lives after the shooting:  https://www-m.cnn.com/2019/06/14/politics/congressional-baseball-shooting-survivors/index.html …

We’re back playing baseball today because of the heroic actions by many on the field that day. Two years after the Congressional Baseball Game shooting, I continue to be thankful for each & every one of these men and women who are part of a bond that cannot be broken. pic.twitter.com/VAv1I7LnJP

I had the privilege of meeting veterans including Dale Gray of Lincoln, Ellis Gemberling of Springfield, Charlie Downs of Pana, and Richard Allen of Savoy this week when they traveled to D.C. as part of an Honor Flight. pic.twitter.com/zyoDWV97ky

Had a couple great days in the district at the end of last week. Spent time in Bloomington-Normal, Funks Grove, Champaign-Urbana, Savoy, and Decatur. Some of the stops I made are below in this #districtrecap.

Toured two local farms in rural McLean County this past week - Funks Grove Heritage Fruits & Grains and Funks Grove Pure Maple Sirup. Heard about the opportunities and challenges they face. They also shared some locally tapped maple syrup with the group. pic.twitter.com/QKVRA9zMgr

Veteran and former Monticello Police Chief, John D. Miller, lived his life in humble service to his friends and neighbors. For so many, he was a role model and a mentor, and he will truly be missed. My prayers are with his wife, Karen, his children, and grandchildren. pic.twitter.com/AZ9S3DFTki

Devastating news that the Nutwood Levee has overtopped, which will drastically impact many in southwestern IL. For those in the area, please use extreme caution & stay clear of IL Rte 16. Please join me in keeping these residents in your thoughts & prayers.
